content.value:
Elasticsearch relicensing, Freenode implosion, utter lack of FSF accountability:

I hope folks are noticing the same pattern I am. Governance is an important factor in risk assessment. How resources are stewarded matters.
content.html: Elasticsearch relicensing, Freenode implosion, utter lack of FSF accountability: I hope folks are noticing the same pattern I am. Governance is an important factor in risk assessment. How resources are stewarded matters.
